it.polimi.se2018.model.cards

Class ToolCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.cards.ToolCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ToolCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Card, java.lang.Cloneable
    Class ToolCard implements Card This class is used to create the ToolCards
    Author:
    Davide Lorenzi JSON ToolCard file written by Davide Lorenzi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ToolCard

        public ToolCard(java.lang.String cardName,
                java.lang.String description,
                int cardNumber,
                int numMarkers,
                int price,
                java.lang.String dieColor)
        Constructor method of the ToolCard class This method is used to build a ToolCard Object Constructor method of the ToolCard class This method initialize the ToolCard object
        Parameters:
        cardName - cardName of the ToolCard
        numMarkers - number of Favour Markers put on a ToolCard
        price - Favour Markers needed to buy a ToolCard
        description - Contains the cardDescription of the effective action of the card
        cardNumber - Is the number of the card, for a faster identification and use
        dieColor - Is the color of the die used to activate the card
